title: What Happens When PC Memory Prices Are Too Much to Handle?
full_text: What Happens When PC Memory Prices Are Too Much to Handle?. The world's largest PC maker tells us why the next PC you buy may be more premium or less powerful than ever.. Despite the hit of President Donald Trumps boneheaded tariff scheme, the tumult of 2025, and rampant price fluctuations, laptops did alright in 2025. Unfortunately, 2026 will bear even less sunshine … [+8516 chars]
